page.title: Infrastructure
page.content:
Infrastructure applications

Performance under pressure

The infrastructure sector includes several diverse industries that play an essential role in our modern lives. From building roads, to maintaining utilities, to doing the heavy work of mining and forestry, infrastructure workers need powerful, reliable equipment that delivers peak performance while minimizing unintended downtime.

In addition to providing the industry’s best selection of hoists, winches, slewing ring bearings, and swing drives, we also offer smart interactive solutions—components and electronic monitoring systems that seamlessly communicate with other parts of the machine and operator to provide greater control. These innovative systems streamline your operation by providing the technology and engineering you need to revolutionize your equipment and maximize your productivity.

SEE BROCHURE

In addition to providing the industry’s best selection of hoists, winches, slewing ring bearings, and swing drives, we also offer smart interactive solutions—components and electronic monitoring systems that seamlessly communicate with other parts of the machine and operator to provide greater control. These innovative systems streamline your operation by providing the technology and engineering you need to revolutionize your equipment and maximize your productivity.

SEE BROCHURE
Mobile cranes

TWG’s experience and expertise with hoists have been proven time and time again over the last 75 years in the field. Our products will be right beside you helping you do your job, no matter how big the job.
